comments:

Further analysis shows that org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui.internal.reports.XMLTraceReportWizard.generateStatistics shows that the getClassClass method is null sometimes.  The following check should be done.


if (proc.getClassClass() != null)
   buffer.append(" classClass=\"").append(proc.getClassClass().getId()).append("\"");
